community.name: MIIVERSE SKETCH Artwork Community
community.description: MIIVERSE SKETCH drawings created by users of the North American version of GAME and WARIO. Give a Yeah! to the ones you like, and be sure to leave comments too!

community.name: MIIVERSE SKETCH Word Community
community.description: MIIVERSE SKETCH word suggestions for the North American version of GAME and WARIO. The more Yeahs a word has, the more likely it is to be chosen. If there's a word you want to see drawn in the MIIVERSE SKETCH Artwork Community, be sure to give it a Yeah!
